title: Create dependency-mapper for cross-reference integrity maintenance

description.summary: Missing agent for maintaining accurate cross-references and dependency tracking. Required for system maintenance and reference integrity.
description.business_value: System maintenance through automated dependency tracking and reference integrity
description.technical_scope: Develop maintenance agent for dependency mapping and cross-reference validation

functional: Map and track system dependencies across components
Detect and report broken or invalid references
technical: Integration with file system and documentation structure

implementation.approach: Deploy infrastructure specialist with dependency mapping capabilities
implementation.architecture: Dependency tracking framework with validation and reporting
implementation.validation: Dependency mapping testing and reference validation

risks.mitigation: Cycle detection algorithms and dependency visualization

acceptance_criteria: Detects and reports integrity issues accurately
